description.p: As required by the Eclipse Foundation Technology Compatibility Kit License, following is a summary of the TCK results for releases of EclipseLink.

Product Name, Version and download URL (if applicable): EclipseLink 5.0.0-B02
Specification Name, Version and download URL: Jakarta Persistence 3.2
TCK Version, digital SHA-256 fingerprint and download URL: Jakarta Persistence TCK 3.2.0, SHA-256: db74101c3f52f737f57804271ea9c845cb1941f2a0685284c54c4ad4fa1f05c7
Public URL of TCK Results Summary: TCK results summary
Any Additional Specification Certification Requirements: None
Java runtime used to run the implementation: Oracle JDK "17.0.10", Oracle JDK "21.0.2"
Summary of the information for the certification environment, operating system, cloud, …: Apache Derby 10.15.2.0, Linux
I acknowledge that the Organization I represent accepts the terms of the EFTL.
I attest that all TCK requirements have been met, including any compatibility rules.
